name: RY-589 Ultimo bot
descriptions: RYâ€“589 Ultimo bot is a unique sentry bot operating at Big MT in 2281.
This robot can be found patrolling the outdoor area of the X-7a "Left Field" artillery launch.
It is possible for the RY-589 Ultimo bot to contain more loot when destroyed than any other robot. It may drop over seven pieces of scrap metal and/or over seven scrap electronics.
RY-589 Ultimo bot appears only in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Old World Blues.
